content.raw:
There is a gap in the world big enough to fall through as shown in the attached screenshots.

It is in urban\_circuit\_practice\_2 near the platform where the first person artifact is \(the third platform as you go deeper into the world\).

It is possible this has been fixed over the past few days. The output of `hg parent` that shows the revision information that I am using is as follows:

`changeset: 2151:0488f3652adc`  
`branch: urban_circuit`  
`tag: tip`  
`parent: 2138:6fd0fe2caeeb`  
`parent: 2150:c8eb558aeeba`  
`user: Alfredo Bencomo bencomo@osrfoundation.org`  
`date: Sat Dec 14 01:48:16 2019 +0000`  
`summary: Merged in robotikacz/subt_robotika_x2_sensor_config_1/submitted_models/subt_robotika_x2_sensor_config_1 (pull request #377)`

Update: we have a video but it was not uploading properly. I have added screenshots instead.

It is in urban_circuit_practice_2 near the platform where the first person artifact is (the third platform as you go deeper into the world).
